thi-ap31:3.1: 1 Yasavatīpamukhaaṭṭhārasabhikkhunīsahassaapadāna → yasavatīpamukhabhikkhunīnaṃ apadānaṃ (bj) | aṭṭhārasasahassakhattiyakaññātherīnamapadānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yasavatīpamukhāni khattiyakaññā bhikkhuniyo aṭṭhārasa sahassāni apadānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap31:5.1: Purimaṃ kusalaṃ kammaṃ → parikammañca kusalaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | purimaṃ kammaṃ kusalaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap31:7.4: katametaṃ mahāmune → katamhehi mahāmune (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
